# Turtleand AI Lab

> A hands-on, 6-module curriculum for building practical LLM tools and agents. Self-paced, free, and open.

## Curriculum

### Module 0: Setup & Safety
- [Agent notifications](https://lab.turtleand.com/topics/agent-notifications): Get notified when your agent finishes using hooks and ntfy.
- [Running inference locally](https://lab.turtleand.com/topics/running-inference-locally): Easily setup & run an LLM on your own machine.

### Module 0: Fast Track Setup
- [Access & secrets](https://lab.turtleand.com/topics/access-secrets): Configure API keys and secrets securely for model access.
- [Safety baseline](https://lab.turtleand.com/topics/safety-baseline): Practical safety for AI infrastructure — firewalls, audits, and access control.

### Module 2: AI Integration & Orchestration
- [AI-first lifestyle](https://lab.turtleand.com/topics/ai-first-lifestyle): Morning briefings, memory systems, and making AI work while you sleep.
- [Automation pipelines](https://lab.turtleand.com/topics/automation-pipelines): Cron-driven AI workflows, multi-stage processing, and overnight analysis.
- [How I built a knowledge-base MCP server for my articles](https://lab.turtleand.com/topics/building-mcp-server): I built an MCP server that exposes 51 articles to any AI client. Two tools, zero config, no API keys. Here's how it works.

### Module 1: AI Power User
- [Model selection & economics](https://lab.turtleand.com/topics/model-selection-economics): When to use Opus vs Sonnet, quota management, and cost-per-output thinking.
- [Multi-tool AI workflows](https://lab.turtleand.com/topics/multi-tool-workflows): Running 3+ AI tools in parallel, choosing the right tool for each task.
- [Prompt mastery](https://lab.turtleand.com/topics/prompt-mastery): Beyond basics — structured prompting for autonomous systems.
- [Voice & multimodal workflows](https://lab.turtleand.com/topics/voice-multimodal-workflows): Voice-to-AI pipelines, TTS output, and audio as a primary instruction method.

## About
Created by Turtleand — software engineer building AI education that's practical, not theoretical.
- Portal: https://turtleand.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/turtleand
